pages.text: Upon first joining a level, you will be granted a starter kit and this guide book. Right click with the starter kit to receive the following ships:$(li)$(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/battleships/kilgobnet)Kilgobnet/$$(li)$(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/scouts/maori)Maori/$$(li)$(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/carriers/nighthawk)Nighthawk/$$(li)$(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/supports/cybele)Cybele/$$(li)$(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/submarines/raider)Raider/$

You will not gain hulls from a game of Naval Warfare if you lose due to timing out or forfeiting. This is to prevent exploits for quickly gaining easy hulls. You also don't get any hulls if you're in creative mode to prevent inventory clutter.
